settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make your theme customizable.

settings.label: Google Fonts Name
settings.info: Use "," to separate fonts name if you have multiple fonts. For ex: Montserrat, Roboto, Roboto Condensed

settings.label: Use image or text for logo?
Logo image is used when using Retina

settings.content: Maximum logo dimensions are 500px wide by 200px high.Your uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Header Background 3 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #141414 (use for background of SHOP BY CATEGORY)

settings.label: Header Background 4 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #e84625 (use for background of cart items)

settings.label: Header Text 1 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #3c3c3c (use for text links in Header Middle)

settings.label: Header Text 2 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #fff (use for SHOP BY CATEGORY, Shopping Cart, My Wishlist, Login/Register My account)

settings.label: Header Line 1 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #dadada (use for lines between links in Header Middle)

settings.label: Header Line 2 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #4f4f4f (use for line before the Dropdown Login)

settings.label: Header Line 3 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #000 (use for line in the Dropdown Login)

settings.label: Choose link list for Header Middle Link

settings.label: Footer Text 3 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #fff (use for Footer text at Footer Middel)

settings.label: Footer Text 4 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #ccc (use for Footer text at Footer Bottom)

settings.label: Footer Line Color
settings.info: Default Value: #dadada (use for line in Footer Top & input of Newsletter)

settings.label: Footer Line 2 Color
settings.info: Default Value: #afea03 (use for line Live Chat)

settings.content: IMPORTANT: For best results, upload images that are at least 900px wide. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.

settings.info: User can select multiple colors (size, brand...) or only one color (size, brand...)?

settings.label: Shop by tags 2 list
settings.info: Separate by a comma, i.e "Less than $299, $300 - $899".

settings.label: Shop by tags 3 list
settings.info: Separate by a comma, i.e "Dincidunteros, Nectellus, Solutmades".

settings.label: Shop by tags 4 list
settings.info: Separate by a comma, i.e "Cosmopolis, Solutmades, Loremous Comodous".

settings.label: Show all / Only a few collections
List of collections
settings.info: Use "," to separate collections items if you have multiple collections. For ex: Shop, Collections

settings.label: Resize image?
settings.info: If your images don't have the same size, pleases turn on resize image to have better look.

settings.label: Allow customers to add notes to their order?
settings.info: Only enabled in the ajax cart if you use your cart.liquid markup. See docs below.

settings.label: Shipping Rates Calculator default country selection

options.value: Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The
options.label: Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The

options.value: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands
options.label: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Shipping rates calculator submit button label
Shipping rates calculator submit button label when calculating
Number of blog post per page
Text Description
settings.default: Sign up for a free account at Ella Boutique.

settings.label: Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency?

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/How_to_Show_Multiple_Currencies#Do_tell_where_the_money_is) (Do tell where the money is).

settings.label: Enable Lazy Loading Effect on PC?
Enable Lazy Loading Effect on Mobile Devices?
